Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Garden Ring Hotel places you in the heart of Moscow, minutes from Vasnetsov House Museum and close to Red Square. This 4-star hotel is close to St. Basil's Cathedral and Moscow Kremlin.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 85 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your memory foam bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Guests can catch a ride on the shuttle (surcharge), which operates within 100 km.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Guests can catch a ride on the shuttle (surcharge), which operates within 100 km.

Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

A stay at Garden Ring Hotel places you in the heart of Moscow, minutes from Vasnetsov House Museum and close to Red Square. This 4-star hotel is close to St. Basil's Cathedral and Moscow Kremlin.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Vasnetsov House Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Moscow Circus on Tsvetnoy Boulevard - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Moscow Durov Animal Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Olimpiyskiy Sports Complex - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Moscow Theatre Et Cetera - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Obraztsov Puppet Theatre - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Griboyedov Monument - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Central Academic Theatre of the Russian Army - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Menshikov Tower - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Sanduny Bath House - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Hermitage Garden - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Moscow Museum of Modern Art - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Novaya Opera Theatre - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Vysokopetrovsky Monastery - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
The State Literary Museum - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Garden Ring Hotel is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 25.3 km / 15.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room Only Rate without SPA access and without Breakfast Hotel Tariff Notes: Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Early departures will be charged 100% of the booking amount. IMPORTANT INFORMATION: The usage of The Thermal Zone of the Spa is limited to 1,5 hours per 24 hours stay (directly from the check in and before the check out). SPA access is not included in Room only rates. ***IMPORTANT NOTE*** SPA Center working hours: - Thermal Area & Pool: 7am-11pm, 11pm-7am (night time) - Visiting Thermal area with kids is possible only at weekends (Friday through Sunday) and on public holidays from 12pm till 4pm. - SPA treatments: 10am-10pm
